function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of understanding of transmission risk and vulnerability","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Descriptive research involving on-site measurements and observations of a parking building increases the risk of exposure to infectious diseases for the researchers and personnel involved.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of citizen engagement in governance processes","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Legal implications and contract risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for capacity building at multiple levels for effective community-based interventions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Barriers in risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through mass media data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Falta de ergonomía en el puesto de trabajo","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using a likert scale to measure agreement may result in subjective interpretation and response
